demos.name: EDI Wallet
demos.subtitle: European Digital Identity Wallet
demos.description: Experience a prototype European digital identity wallet with credential management, QR scanning, and selective disclosure flows.

demos.name: DPP System
demos.subtitle: Digital Product Passport Platform
demos.description: Explore a full Digital Product Passport system tracking Brazilian hardwood furniture from sustainable forest harvest through manufacturing, with UNTP verifiable credentials, ESPR compliance data, and supply chain traceability.

demos.name: AI Tax → UBI
demos.subtitle: Universal Basic Income Simulator
demos.description: Interactive simulation showing how Universal Basic Income could be funded through taxation on AI-driven automation, with real-time policy controls and animated money flow visualization.
